data.name: UCF Webcourses Dark and Compact
data.description:
A theme I whipped together to help my eyes stop bleeding when browsing my courses.
I only touched the surface on modifications, so some things are still white.

I focused on:
- Modules page
- Dashboard
- Left side navigation bar
- Inbox (minor changes)
- Course selector pull-out

If you want to yell at me for something being white, or to say thanks, you can find me on Discord: Para#2248

data.name: Tumblr Redesign Redesign
data.description: In the beginning of September 2015, Tumblr made a major redesign that totally threw out the previous "nested blockquote" commenting presentation with a linear, forum-like commenting presentation. However, whoever designed the layout wasted a HUGE amount of vertical space causing "wastelands". This CSS tries to fix that stupidity.
